tool_description: Correlates fulfillment performance metrics with customer satisfaction scores and feedback to identify which operational factors most impact customer experience.

satisfaction_sources.description: Sources of satisfaction data to include

correlation_strength.description: Minimum correlation strength to report: weak, moderate, strong

error_messages: Invalid satisfaction sources: Use combinations of [surveys, reviews, ratings, support_tickets, returns]
Invalid correlation strength: Use one of [weak, moderate, strong]
Insufficient satisfaction data: Need sufficient customer feedback data for correlation analysis
usage: Specify satisfaction_sources and optionally set minimum correlation_strength. The tool identifies which fulfillment metrics most strongly correlate with customer satisfaction.

top_impact_factors.description: Fulfillment factors with highest customer satisfaction impact
